channel.title: Putting it all together
channel.description: i have a free host. i have a no-ip. i have a server and source. i can edit the ip on the source to where it goes. i dont know how to make it all work lol.

item.title: Putting it all together
item.dc:creator: @Killea Killea
item.description:
@Killea wrote:

[quote=“me caveman, post:3, topic:357654”][quote author=Killea link=topic=454171.msg3327027#msg3327027 date=1283187668]

i have a free host.
i have a no-ip.
i have a server and source.
i can edit the ip on the source to where it goes.
i dont know how to make it all work lol.

Make an no-ip, put the ip in your server client, portforward than runserver.bat and have fun
[/quote]

okay thanks im trying stuff out here[/quote]

If you cant follow it than i will tell it more helpfull ;D but if you understand this than OK

Read full topic
